attributes.action: Call for a vote of no confidence
attributes.additional_details: To help restore confidence and sprits in the government from the people of the United Kingdom
attributes.background: Would like to call a vote of no confidence as this government seems to be losing the confidence of it’s own citizens

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for a vote of no confidence in the Government. This is set out in the Committee's standards: https://petition.parliament.uk/help

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that.

You might like to sign this petition:
Call a General Election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700143
